review: A must have if you are using front projector and want to have instant Amazon content in your home theater. What you also get is TONS of other content through various free apps (check out Pluto TV - I friggin' love it!). HD streaming is smooth and instant given you have a decent IP bandwidth speed available. Speak and seek is really nice too: fast, reliable and seamless. My kids are also enjoying the games. They are not XBOX 360 quality by any stretch of imagination, but are decent, run well, and most of them are free - a combo hard to beat these days. I only wish the gaming controller was available in less than 4 weeks... Overall score... it's a must have for any Amazon Prime member. I snatched it while it was on 30% off sale... sucks to be you if you didn't, lol.
